entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Rain showers beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
